arabic.title: ألف وعد
text: و في يوم صحيت ما لقتشى حد
على حبه كنت بنام و اقوم
و في يوم صحيت ملقيتشى حد
خلانى احبه ياما شفت الدنيا بعنيه

english.title: THOUSAND PROMISE
text: everyday he promise me with a thousand promise
he swears and say we will live we will live forever for each other
everyday he promise me with a thousand promise
he swears and say we will live we will live forever for each other
he made me go up up to the starts
he made me love him day after day
on his love i was weaking up and sleep
and one day i woke up i find nobody (x2)
he made me hold on to his love he made me love him
i saw life in his eyes
i after you loved me do you how handel leaving me
he made me go up up to the starts
he made me love him day after day
on his love i was weaking up and sleep
and one day i woke up i find nobody
